markdownRemark.html:
Each version of the software will be attributed a version tag. There is a convention how the numbers should be assigned.

In the image above, the version tag consists of 3 numbers: 5.2.1:

Major - for major features which are not backward compatible

Minor - for new features which aree backward compatible

Patch - for bug fixes which are also backward compatible

The very first version of the software is usually tagged as: 1.0.0

See the picture below for the more detailled explanation:

Reference:

https://docs.npmjs.com/about-semantic-versioning
